hero.title: Junior Developer
hero.tagline: Building innovative solutions with modern web technologies and AI

story.content: I'm an aspiring software engineer passionate about creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems. Currently studying at Flatiron School's Software Engineering program, I'm building a strong foundation in full-stack development while working on projects that make a difference.

My journey into tech started with a curiosity about how things work and evolved into a deep passion for building applications. Through intensive bootcamp training at Moringa School and continuous learning on platforms like Coursera, I've developed skills across the entire development stack - from crafting intuitive user interfaces to designing robust backend systems.

What drives me is problem-solving. I love breaking down complex challenges into manageable pieces and finding elegant solutions. Whether it's optimizing database queries, creating responsive designs, or implementing new features, I approach each task with curiosity and determination. My faith guides my work ethic and commitment to excellence.
